name: Chi Sao Sensitivity
description: Develop tactile reflexes and sensitivity through Wing Chun’s signature Chi Sao (Sticky Hands) drills.

cards.title: Single-Hand Chi Sao
cards.description: A fundamental drill to build sensitivity and energy flow in close combat.
bulletpoints: Maintain relaxed yet responsive arm contact
Focus on feeling the opponent’s energy rather than brute force
Use circular hand movements to deflect incoming strikes
cards.summaryText: Roll a single arm to read pressure changes and redirect strikes without muscling through.

cards.title: Double-Hand Chi Sao
cards.description: An advanced variation that integrates both hands to develop reflexive counterattacks.
bulletpoints: Maintain centerline control while engaging both hands
Use light, controlled pressure to manipulate the opponent
Flow between offense and defense seamlessly
cards.summaryText: Let both arms cycle with soft pressure so counterattacks fire the moment a line opens.
